Text: Ecogas COBRA Cc Thanks for forwarding the COBRA emails to me After reading them I am confused as to where we stand The people listed below are on Ecogas COBRA and I suspect that they have not been presented with the option of switching to Enron COBRA At the very least I do not think it has been presented to them in the light that Ecogas COBRA will soon be nonexistent Could someone in your shop send or resend COBRA packets to the people listed below I will send a letter to the same list to let them know that they need to switch or lose coverage after January This may be duplicating earlier efforts but I want to make sure that no one falls through the cracks after we dissolve Ecogas Thanks Kelly Mahmoud Alan Erwin Jeffrey Cove Austin TX Robert P Green Domart Ave Norwalk CA Thomas Hall W th St Austin TX Donald J Hazen Muro Cr Placentia CA Teddy Ogden Moonstone Ct OFallon MO Michael Story King Dr Columbus TX

RE Ecogas Cc send signed contracts and numbers to Michelle Michelle please email your fax number to me Kelly Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday December AM To Cc Subject Ecogas Michelle I think Kelly has already sent the s to Bracewell and the docs are in progress Kelly if this is not correct please make sure Michelle and Bracewell have the right numbers to fill in the blanks on the employee separation agreements If youve already done so just confirm to Michelle Thanks Forwarded by Randal MaffettHOUECT on AM Michelle Cash PM To Randal CT cc Subject Ecogas Randy I havent received the numbers for the releases for the Ecogas personnel under contract Would you mind sending it to me so that I can send it to outside counsel to prepare the releases Also could you please send me copies of the Agreements for the Ecogas employees The only ones I have are unsigned Thanks a lot Michelle

RE Ecogasjust informed me that we are going to use the PV calculation for the employee contract settlements Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday December AM To COGAScom Subject RE Ecogas Kelly my fax is Thanks Michelle Kelly Mahmoud COGAScom on AM To cc Subject RE Ecogas I will send signed contracts and numbers to Michelle Michelle please email your fax number to me Kelly Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday December AM To Cc Subject Ecogas Michelle I think Kelly has already sent the s to Bracewell and the docs are in progress Kelly if this is not correct please make sure Michelle and Bracewell have the right numbers to fill in the blanks on the employee separation agreements If youve already done so just confirm to Michelle Thanks Forwarded by Randal MaffettHOUECT on AM Michelle Cash PM To Randal CT cc Subject Ecogas Randy I havent received the numbers for the releases for the Ecogas personnel under contract Would you mind sending it to me so that I can send it to outside counsel to prepare the releases Also could you please send me copies of the Agreements for the Ecogas employees The only ones I have are unsigned Thanks a lot Michelle

Ecogas COBRA Cc Thanks for forwarding the COBRA emails to me After reading them I am confused as to where we stand The people listed below are on Ecogas COBRA and I suspect that they have not been presented with the option of switching to Enron COBRA At the very least I do not think it has been presented to them in the light that Ecogas COBRA will soon be nonexistent Could someone in your shop send or resend COBRA packets to the people listed below I will send a letter to the same list to let them know that they need to switch or lose coverage after January This may be duplicating earlier efforts but I want to make sure that no one falls through the cracks after we dissolve Ecogas Thanks Kelly Mahmoud Alan Erwin Jeffrey Cove Austin TX Robert P Green Domart Ave Norwalk CA Thomas Hall W th St Austin TX Donald J Hazen Muro Cr Placentia CA Teddy Ogden Moonstone Ct OFallon MO Michael Story King Dr Columbus TX
